LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.label: Arquebusier
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.description: Standard Arquebusier model, has good precision fire capability at all ranges making it the backbone of an automatroid army.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.label: Jaeger
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.description: An Arquebusier variant specializing in stealth operations and guerilla warfare sabotaging equipment behind enemy lines. It has high mobility and and an active camouflage ability.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.label: Pioneer
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.description: A gorward reconnaissance variant of the Arquebusier, Pioneers are equipped with an improved sight sensor package giving it better capability in field operations. In a pinch, it can be used to hunt wildlife.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.label: Sniper
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.description: Snipers have an improved sight sensor package and fire control system. This model Arquebusier has the best long range fire precision among all other variants.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
